articles.author: Shweta Kukreti
articles.title: Total solar eclipse final countdown begins: Know about the five stages and their duration - Hindustan Times
articles.description: On April 8, a total solar eclipse will traverse the sky over North America, making the moon appear exceptionally enormous in its new phase.
articles.content: On April 8, a total solar eclipse will traverse the sky over North America, making the moon appear exceptionally enormous in its new phase. The moon will be able to obscure the sun's disk due to its … [+3261 chars]
